translations.en:
: ** :person_walking: You are walking quietly, the weather is clear, just like the road. You think about the sweet night you will spend in an inn at the next village you will cross, and this allows you to keep the courage to move forward. The road is so calm that, while walking, you immerse yourself in your thoughts. You realize that, although you have begun your adventure in order to prove your worth and to marry the princess, you start to love your journey more and more. While you are no longer very far from the village which is your objective of the day, it starts raining.

:person_walking: Continue to walk
:person_running: Speed up so you donâ€™t get too wet

*-Use the reactions to take an action. :warning: Not reacting is also considered a choice!*

translations.en: ** | ğŸŒ³ You donâ€™t know what to do, but you notice a small forest on your right. You are a bit thirsty, fortunately you hear the run-off of a stream of water. You head towards it and drink from it. What a thirst-quenching water! You feel way better. As you were busy doing all this, the rain stopped, it lasted for only about ten minutes. As you are about to resume your journey, you notice a bag full of coins and an object lying next to it. You take it all, get out of the forest and leave in the direction of the village .
